name: dataplex-mcp-server
description: GCP Dataplex integration for BigQuery metadata, data lineage, and data quality monitoring. Access table schemas, track data transformations, and monitor data quality scans.

projectId.title: GCP Project ID
projectId.description: Your Google Cloud Platform project ID (e.g., my-project-123)

cacheEnabled.title: Enable Caching
cacheEnabled.description: Enable in-memory caching for improved performance

tools.name: list_datasets
tools.description: List all BigQuery datasets in the configured GCP project

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: List all tables in a BigQuery dataset

tools.name: get_table_metadata
tools.description: Get comprehensive metadata for a BigQuery table including schema, descriptions, clustering, partitioning, and partition filters

tools.name: get_data_lineage
tools.description: Get upstream and downstream data lineage for a BigQuery table with Mermaid diagram visualization. Includes SQL transformations (CTAS and INSERT) in results (max depth: 3 levels)

tools.name: get_sql_transformations
tools.description: Get SQL transformations (CREATE TABLE AS SELECT and INSERT INTO statements) from lineage processes. Excludes UPDATE, MERGE, and DELETE operations

tools.name: get_data_quality_results
tools.description: Get the latest data quality scan results for a BigQuery table
